long_description: The Ultimate Direction Naviti hydration waistpack lets you tackle the trails in comfort. Two water bottles and roomy gear pockets haul your day-hiking essentials. Adjustable air-mesh hipbelt offers stability and comfort. Breathable, moisture-wicking 3D air-mesh back panel helps keeps you comfortable and dry. Store gear in the main compartment and outer front pocket with room for snacks, sunscreen, rain gear and camera; 2 zippered pockets on hipbelt hold small essentials. Two 20-fl. oz. bottles feature soft, leakproof Kicker valves for convenient 1-handed opening, closing and drinking. 2 side bottle pockets feature a bungee locking system that holds bottles securely while allowing easy, single-handed removal. The Ultimate Direction Naviti hydration waistpack features a webbing handle on top for convenient grab-and-go and reflective accents for visibility.
short_description: The Ultimate Direction Naviti hydration waistpack lets you tackle the trails in comfort. Two water bottles and roomy gear pockets haul your day-hiking essentials.
